data.eml:eml: Redescription of Astyanax guaporensis Eigenmann, 1911 (Characiformes: Characidae), a small characid from the rio Madeira basin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marinho, Manoela M. F., Ohara, Willian M. (2013): Redescription of Astyanax guaporensis Eigenmann, 1911 (Characiformes: Characidae), a small characid from the rio Madeira basin. Zootaxa 3652 (4): 475-484, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3652.4.5
